description: This CSS file contains styles and theme variables for managing light and dark themes in a simple calculator application. It defines CSS variables for colors and various styles for components such as the app header, logos, and buttons.

classes.name: App
classes.description: The main application container with styles for text alignment, background color, and minimum height.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Styles for the application logo, including height and pointer-events.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Styles for the application header, including background color, layout, and font size.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styles for application links, including color and transition effects.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styles for the theme toggle button, including position, background color, and interactive effects.
